name: UniFi Network Server (VM)
description: UniFi Network Server VM is designed to manage and monitor UniFi networks (Wi-Fi, Ethernet, etc.) on a Debian 12 virtual machine. This VM configuration provides all necessary resources and setup details to support an efficient UniFi Network deployment.

notes.text: If AVX instruction set is not supported, the VM version is recommended.
This script requires Proxmox VE version 7.0 or later.
